InternalApi._comment_ApiKey: REQUIRED: System API key for inter-service communication

Cors._comment_AllowedOrigins: REQUIRED for production: Array of allowed origins for CORS
Cors._comment_AllowedMethods: OPTIONAL: Array of allowed HTTP methods (default: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS)
Cors._comment_AllowCredentials: OPTIONAL: Whether to allow credentials (cookies, auth headers)
Cors._comment_PreflightMaxAge: OPTIONAL: Preflight cache duration in seconds (default: 3600)
Cors._comment_AllowedHeaders: OPTIONAL: Array of allowed headers (if empty, allows any)
Cors._comment_ExposedHeaders: OPTIONAL: Array of exposed headers (if empty, allows any)

HangfireSettings._comment_DashboardPassword: REQUIRED: Min 12 chars for Basic Auth validation
